@graph.title: The Python Quick Syntax Reference
abstract: The Python Quick Syntax Reference is the “go to” book that contains an easy to read and useguide to Python programming and development. This condensed code and syntaxreference presents the Python language in a well-organized format designed tobe used time and again. You won't find jargon, bloated samples, case studies, or history of Hello Worldand computer theory in this handy reference. This Python syntax reference ispacked with useful information and is a must-have for any Python developer

The Python Quick Syntax Reference is the “go to” book that contains an easy to read and use guide to Python programming and development. This condensed code and syntax reference presents the Python language in a well-organized format designed to be used time and again.You won't find jargon, bloated samples, case studies, or history of Hello World and computer theory in this handy reference. This Python syntax reference is packed with useful information and is a must-have for any Python developer.
